programme.title: Class of 1984
programme.desc: A high-school music teacher (Perry King) hunts a hoodlum student (Timothy Van Patten) for attacking his wife (Merrie Lynn Ross).

programme.title: Another
programme.desc: After a chain of deaths at a junior high school, new transfer student Koichi turns to a mysterious girl who holds the key to the dark mystery.

programme.title: House of the Living Dead
programme.desc: A collector (Mark Burns) of souls wants his sister-in-law's (Shirley Anne Field) in 19th-century South Africa.

programme.title: Cop game
programme.desc: Two individuals go under cover to investigate a series of murders amid the Vietnam War's final days.

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: An electronics mogul (John Ritter) coerces a former commander (Olivier Gruner) into helping him find the terrorist who killed his wife.

programme.title: The Wild Geese
programme.desc: Mercenaries (Richard Burton, Roger Moore, Richard Harris) for a London banker parachute into Africa to put a useful president back in power.

programme.title: War Pigs
programme.desc: A U.S. Army captain (Luke Goss) and a German-born legionnaire (Dolph Lundgren) train a unit of misfit soldiers to battle the Nazis during World War II.

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: The warden of a 2022 prison sends an ex-Marine (Ray Liotta) to a jungle island where inmates are left to die.

programme.title: Heaven's Burning
programme.desc: Gangsters and a vengeful husband (Kenji Isomura) pursue a Japanese bride (Yûki Kudô) and her newly found Australian lover (Russell Crowe).
